Identities.Title: Agent of FILTER. K.N.Y.F.E.
Incapacitated: One Hero may use 1 Power now.
One Player may Play 1 card now.

Identities.Title: Rogue Agent. Rogue Agent: K.N.Y.F.E.
Identities.Innate Power: Reveal the bottom card of a Deck. Either put it into play or discard it.
Incapacitated: One Hero may Use a Power now.
Reveal the top card of a Deck. Put it into Play or Discard it.

Amplified Combatant.text: K.N.Y.F.E. deals up to 3 targets 1 melee damage and 1 energy damage each.

Energy Burn.text: K.N.Y.F.E. deals 1 target 3 energy damage. Then, if that target has 10 or more HP, K.N.Y.F.E. deals it 2 energy damage.

For the Greater Good.text: K.N.Y.F.E. deals herself 3 psychic damage. If she takes damage this way, you may draw 1 card, play 1 card, and use 1 power now.

Incidental Contact.text: K.N.Y.F.E. deals each target 1 energy damage. K.N.Y.F.E. may deal any target dealt damage this way an additional 1 energy damage.

Wrecking Uppercut.text: K.N.Y.F.E. deals 1 target 3 melee damage. Discard the top card of the villain deck.

Battlefield Experience.power: K.N.Y.F.E. deals 1 target 2 melee damage and 2 energy damage, then destroy this card.
Battlefield Experience.on destroy: When this card is destroyed, you may draw 1 card and play 1 card.

Primed Punch.start of turn: At the start of your turn, K.N.Y.F.E. may deal 1 target 4 melee damage. If she deals damage this way, destroy this card.
Primed Punch.power: K.N.Y.F.E. deals 1 target 1 melee damage and 1 energy damage.

Flawless Execution.text: Whenever damage dealt by K.N.Y.F.E. reduces a target to 1 HP, destroy that target.

Inflitrate and Obfuscate.text: The first time K.N.Y.F.E. would be dealt damage by an environment target each turn, you may redirect that damage to the villain target with the second highest HP.

modifiers.text: First time dealt damage by environment target, redirect to villain with 2nd highest HP

Kinetic Neutralizer.text: Increase damage dealt by K.N.Y.F.E. to the villain target with the highest HP by 1.

modifiers.text: +1 damage dealt to villain with highest HP

Overdo It.start of turn: At the start of your turn, you may play a card.
Overdo It.end of turn: At the end of your turn, K.N.Y.F.E. may deal herself 2 psychic damage. If she does not take damage this way, destroy this card.

Focusing Conduit-Blade.text: Increase energy damage dealt by K.N.Y.F.E. by 1.
Focusing Conduit-Blade.power: K.N.Y.F.E. deals 1 target 3 energy damage. Destroy this card.
Focusing Conduit-Blade.on destroy: You may play an equipment card.

Overcharged Null-Shield.text: Reduce damage dealt to K.N.Y.F.E. by the villain target with the highest HP by 1.

modifiers.text: -1 taken from villain target with highest HP

Prototype Servo-Gauntlet.text: Increase melee damage dealt by K.N.Y.F.E. by 1.
Prototype Servo-Gauntlet.power: K.N.Y.F.E. deals 1 target 2 melee damage. If that target is destroyed, you may destroy an Ongoing card.
